package.name: Age_Gate_Pop_Up
package.summary: Age Gate allows you to lock your store until users confirms their Age.
package.description:
Age Gate Pop-Up enable websites that require Adult Verification to lock their store with the Pop-Up. User will be able to access the store once they confirm their Age on website.
The extension provides flexibility for admin to select page where Pop-Up is required. The content of the Agree and Disagree pop-up are completely manageable through Magento Admin.
Simple 5 minute setup, and your Age Gate pop-up is ready to use. Follow these steps to have it setup instantly:
Install the extension from Magento Connect Edit static block content of "vsourz-age-gate" and "vsourz-age-gate-disagree" if required. Setup system settings from System >> Configuration >> Age Gate Pop-Up
You can learn more about Extension Configuration from How to Use section
Need Support? Click Here
Demo Link: http://extensiondemo.vsourz.co/age-verification
Features: Full control over Pop-Up Content from Magento Admin. Ability to setup time interval for verification Pop-Up. Ability to select the pages where Pop-Up needs to be displayed. Built with Animated effect using CSS3. No technical knowledge required for setup. Automatic pre defined Pop-Up creation.
How to Use? Log into your Magento Admin panel Go to System >> Configuration >> Age Gate Pop-Up Select the required pages from Pages Select Pop-Up Block and Disagree Block id from the drop down Enter the Agree Button and Disagree button text Setup the Cookie interval for the pop-up
package.notes: Age Gate allows you to lock your store until users confirms their Age.
